alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 4:30PM EST until January 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall and snowmelt continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northern West Virginia, including the following areas, Eastern Preston, Eastern Tucker, Preston and Western Tucker. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker
